notes: The channeling must succeed to get a reward.
Can dig up a Bounty Rune, a Healing Salve, a Town Portal Scroll, or a neutral Kobold.
Since the dug up Kobold is a neutral unit, it attacks both factions, and can drop neutral items as well.
Dug up items cannot be sold and are fully shareable.
The same Trusty Shovel cannot spawn the same reward twice in a row.
abilities.description: Channel for 1 second. Can find a Bounty Rune, a Flask, a TP Scroll, or an enemy Kobold.

name: Trusty Shovel
description: Former plaything of a young deity, received as a gift from his uncle.
tips: Assume Trusty Shovel will be used instantly when it's on cooldown, statistically it will give the team 97.5+8.75x GPM or item of the same price, and 69.6+1.75x GPM for the hero use it (x is every time 5 minutes passed, x=0 when the game starts).
